# <a name="how-do-i-turn-off-skype-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="acd31-102">Outlook.com で Skype をオフにするには、どうすればいいですか。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acd31-102">How do I turn off Skype in Outlook.com?</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="acd31-103">Outlook.com から Skype を削除することはできませんが、通知を無効にすることはできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acd31-103">You can't remove Skype from Outlook.com, but you can disable notifications:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="acd31-104">開く</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acd31-104">Open</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="acd31-105">**[設定]** > **[全般]** > **[[通知]](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/notifications)** の順に開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acd31-105">**Settings** > **General** > **[Notifications](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/notifications)**.</span></span> 
2. <span data-ttu-id="acd31-106">**[チャットと通話]** で不要な通知の種類を無効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acd31-106">Under **Chat and call**, disable the notification types you no longer want.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="acd31-107">Skype の使用の詳細については、「[Outlook.com の Skype で、家族や友人と会話する](https://support.office.com/article/83c6a5b1-3921-479c-b9e9-e753ce59c1fa?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acd31-107">For more information on using Skype, read [Talk to family and friends on Skype in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/83c6a5b1-3921-479c-b9e9-e753ce59c1fa?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
